content:
The resident of the village of Vydetskoye of the Velikopisarev community was evacuated by police officers together with volunteers.

About thisShe reported March 23National Police of Ukraine.

The village is under constant shelling by Russia, the evacuation took place in an armored car.

Asreported the armyinform, in three settlements Sumy region declared forced evacuation of children because of enemy shelling
title: In Sumy region, a mother with four children was taken out of shelling
description: This was reported on March 23 by the National Police of Ukraine. The village is under ...
author: Army Inform
